definitions.definition: One who angers easily or goes in search of arguments or fights .
examples: The club was full of eager young hotheads who never seemed to be able to agree on anything.

definitions.definition: One who reacts quickly and without thinking carefully first.
examples: Someone get this hothead out of here before he does some damage.

main_definition: ( derogatory ) One who angers easily or goes in search of arguments or fights .
secondary_definitions: One who reacts quickly and without thinking carefully first.
